department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
short_summary: EF928-231538 - Corrective work on various petroleum equipment - CSA St-Hubert
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the services of a contractor for corrective works on various petroleum equipment at the Canadian Space Agency in St-Hubert. All the details of the requirement can be found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Title and Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3852522771
* **Document Reference**: Document3854954369
* **Title (English)**: EFF Corrective Work on Various Petroleum Equipment
* **Title (French)**: Travaux correctifs sur divers équipements pétroliers
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Publication Date**: February 10, 2023

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: March 10, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Region of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 17, 2019
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 1, 2024
* **SOLICITATION NOTICE**: To be eligible to participate in this tender, companies must have been pre-qualified by Public Works and Government Services Canada.

### Defined Specifications and Requirements

* **Services Required**: Various petroleum equipment repairs and maintenance at the Canadian Space Agency in St-Hubert
* **Scope of Work**: Companies are invited to submit their proposals for the provision of corrective work services on various petroleum equipment.

### Pre-Qualified Firms

The following firms have been pre-qualified to receive the tendering documents:

* GMR Inc.
* PETRO HiTECH
* Services Pétroliers MT Inc.
* Service et Construction mobile Equipements Pétroliers Claude Pedneault Inc
* SM Construction

### Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before 14:00 EST on March 10th, 2023.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

To obtain the tender documents, or for additional information, please contact Fahad Zanoun at fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Note: Selected suppliers will receive a notification directly from Public Works and Government Services Canada.

### Other Details

* The solicitation notice is available in both English and French.
* This is an open tender, and all invited suppliers are subject to equal treatment by the contracting entity.
* It is recommended that suppliers ensure they have met all the requirements specified in the solicitation notice before proceeding with the submission of their proposals.
